game.name: Anomaly President
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this presidential rogue-like action game, gather votes and run for presidency by day, then transform into a warrior to take down your enemies by night! Master unique skills to become a swordmaster, a cyber mage, or anything in between, and overthrow the ruthless president!
